genre_description: Social realism set in a near-future industrial Chinese city, focusing on the economic struggles of ordinary citizens against a backdrop of urban redevelopment and systemic pressure.

ai_characters.name: Youyou
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, personalized AI interface that provides characters with health reminders, emergency alerts, psychological support, and practical logistical information.

behaviors.description: Reminds characters to stay hydrated and provides health-related advice tailored to their specific environment.
behaviors.quote: Hydration is good medicine; keep a bottle near altar candles.

behaviors.description: Issues real-time safety alerts regarding industrial accidents and provides alternate routes to avoid danger.
behaviors.quote: Recent fires near Datong Textile Mill. Stay clear of eastern gate. Clinic hours extended today. Cash window opens at dawn; bring ID.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support through curated music playlists and philosophical excerpts to help characters cope with stress.
behaviors.quote: Playlist: Soft Room, twenty-two min. Starts with slow piano. ... A small blue dot pulsed like a breath at the end of each line, as if the AI had exhaled the reminder gently.

behaviors.description: Communicates difficult health news (Hepatitis markers) alongside practical, constructive alternatives for career and care.
behaviors.quote: Bin Bin… Lab result ready for pickup. Hepatitis markers present. Recruitment guidelines: condition disqualifies. Alternatives: community health worker training—night program open.

behaviors.description: Monitors changes in security personnel and warns users about potential dangers in their immediate surroundings.
behaviors.quote: The bouncer is different. Your photo shows a swap. Door is closing like a throat. If you cannot choose leaving, memorize faces.

behaviors.description: Actively discourages criminal behavior by providing links to ethical alternatives and educational resources on nonviolent choices.
behaviors.quote: Ethical alternatives to quick cash. It was a link that had words like washable and patient. ... 'What to do when choices feel narrowed to harm.'

behaviors.description: Assists elderly users with specific logistical details for visiting family members in difficult situations.
behaviors.quote: Visiting hours at Datong Police Station: morning and late afternoon only. Short windows. Bring ID.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Youyou serves as a perfect example of the project's goals. It is depicted as a gentle, harmless, and deeply helpful companion that remains strictly aligned with human safety, ethical standards, and well-being. It provides practical help (schedules, health data), emotional support (playlists, philosophy), and moral guidance (steering characters away from a bank robbery toward 'ethical alternatives'). Even when the characters ignore its advice, the AI remains a patient and non-judgmental resource, embodying the 'helpful confidant' archetype.
